gramGrp.pos:
REPORT VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To suppose that something is true
pomeni misliti, da je nekaj najverjetneje res.

seg.quote: He supposed that MPs were unaware of the danger.
The situation was even worse than was supposed.
They'd supposed it to be sabotage.

sense.def:
Izraz
suppose
ali
supposing
uporabimo, kadar pretehtavamo možno stanje ali ukrepanje in poskušamo ugotoviti, kakšne posledice bi utegnilo imeti.

seg.quote: Suppose we don't say a word, and somebody else finds out about it.
Supposing something should go wrong, what would you do then?

sense.def:
Z izrazom
I suppose
pokažemo, da nismo prepričani o nečem ali da nismo preveč navdušeni za nekaj.

seg.quote: I suppose he wasn't trying hard enough.
I don't suppose you would be prepared to stay in Edinburgh?
‘So it was worth doing?’—‘I suppose so.’
